name: WP cookiebar for S2M sites
upgrade_notice: Now notifications of new versions is available
author: Sjoerd Blom and Dennis Vergeer

sections.description: WP Cookiebar plugin for S2M sites only
sections.installation: Activate the plugin and obtain your token from S2M and enter it at the settingspage.
sections.changelog:
Changelog.

1.0.5 Initial release after several testreleases.
